mapper.select: SELECT X.RNUM, X.NOTICE_NO, X.MEMBER_NO, X.NOTICE_TITLE, X.NOTICE_CONTENT, X.NOTICE_DATE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.NOTICE_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, A.NOTICE_TITLE, A.NOTICE_CONTENT, A.NOTICE_DATE FROM (SELECT NOTICE_NO, MEMBER_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DATE FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageEnd}) X WHERE X.RNUM >= #{pageBegin}
